00101 class IRpropMinusTrigPower : virtual public ModelInterface {
00102  public:
00103 
00104 //===========================================================================
00127   void initRprop(double _delta0 = 0.0000000001) 
00128   { 
00129     deltaw.resize(w.nelem());
00130     delta.resize (w.nelem());
00131     dedwOld.resize (w.nelem());
00132     delta  = _delta0; 
00133     deltaw = 0; 
00134     dedwOld  = 0; 
00135     delta0 = _delta0;
00136   }
00137 
00138 
00139 //===========================================================================
00169  void rprop(const Array<double> &in,
00170              const Array<double> &out,
00171              double              np   = 1.05  ,
00172              double              nm   = 0  ,
00173              double              dMax = 1   ,
00174              double              dMin = 1e-6 ) 
00175 
00176 {
00177     derror(in, out, false);
00178 
00179     for(unsigned  i = 0; i < w.nelem(); i++) {
00180      
00181       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) > 0) {
00182         delta(i) = pow(delta(i),(1/np));
00183         deltaw(i) = dMax * delta(i) * -sgn(dedw(i));
00184         w(i) += deltaw(i);
00185         dedwOld(i) = dedw(i);
00186       } else if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) < 0) {
00187         double  nm = cos(atan(dedw(i)))/(cos(atan(dedwOld(i))) + cos(atan(dedw(i))));
00188         delta(i) = nm * delta(i);
00189         dedwOld(i) = 0;
00190       } else {
00191         deltaw(i) = dMax * delta(i) * -sgn(dedw(i));
00192         w(i) += deltaw(i);
00193         dedwOld(i) = dedw(i);
00194       }
00195     }
00196   }
00197   
00198 
00199 
00200 //===========================================================================
00218   void clearMemory() { delta = delta0; dedwOld = 0; deltaw = 0; };
00219 
00220 
00221  protected:
00222 
00223 //===========================================================================
00240   int    sgn(double x) 
00241   { 
00242     if (x > 0) return 1; if (x < 0) return -1; return 0; 
00243   }
00244 
00246   double min(double x, double y) { return x < y ? x : y; }
00247 
00249   double max(double x, double y) { return x > y ? x : y; }
00250 
00252   double delta0;
00253 
00255   Array<double> deltaw;     
00256 
00258   Array<double> dedwOld;
00259 
00261   Array<double> delta;
00262 
00263 };
